title: Remove cursive typography and meme content from Valentine UI

requirements.summary: Switch the app typography to classic (non-cursive) by removing all uses of the font-cursive utility on headings and the letter modal title.
acceptanceCriteria: On the proposal screen, the main header "Will you be my Valentine zia?" does not render in a cursive/script font.
On the celebration screen, the headline "YAYYAYYY I KNEW YOU'D SAY YES ILOVEYOUSMM" does not render in a cursive/script font.
In the letter modal, the title "A Letter For You" does not render in a cursive/script font.
No other UI elements use the `.font-cursive` utility to render cursive text.

file_operations.description: Remove the `font-cursive` class from the proposal screen main header and the celebration screen headline so headings use the standard (non-cursive) font.
Remove the `font-cursive` class from the DialogTitle so the letter modal title uses the standard (non-cursive) font.
Remove (or neutralize) the custom `.font-cursive` utility definition to ensure no UI can render cursive text via that utility.

requirements.summary: Remove the extra proposal-screen prompt line so it is not displayed in the question state UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The proposal screen no longer shows the text "I have something special to ask you..." (including the heart emoji).
The rest of the proposal screen layout (question header and Yes/No buttons) remains functional and visually centered.
